DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this feasibility study is to gain an initial assessment of the acute safety and performance of the Apsara Thermal Wand System in human facial tissue.
DOC.brief_title: Application of the Apsara Thermal Wand System
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoker Glogau class 13 Previously chosen to undergo facelift Pregnant, nursing Implanted electromechanical device Allergy to anesthesia or device metals Collagen vascular disease History of keloid or hypertrophic scar formation Uncontrolled diabetes Long term steroid or other immunologic inhibitor use Previous treatment to target area Does not consent to study Does not consent to photography or histological evaluation
